projects.title: Pac-Man
projects.description: A classic arcade game recreated in Java, featuring Pac-Man navigating a maze while avoiding ghosts and collecting pellets.

projects.title: MonkeyType Clone
projects.description: A typing practice application inspired by MonkeyType, built in Java. Users can practice typing in 19 languages and track their performance in real-time, including detailed statistics.

projects.title: Rectavia Studio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive website designed for Rectavia Studio. Built with HTML and Tailwind CSS, it showcases the studio's portfolio and services with a clean, optimized design.
